discover_best_chefs: Discover the Best Chefs Near You
discover_best_chefs_desc: Explore a world of authentic, homemade meals prepared with passion by talented local chefs.
this_chef_has_no_dishes: This chef has no dishes on their menu yet.
no_reviews_for_dish: No reviews for this dish yet. Be the first!
last_5_reviews: Here are the last 5 reviews on your dishes.
no_completed_orders: You haven't completed any orders yet.
chef_is_currently_closed_desc: This chef is not accepting new orders right now. Please check back later.
login_required_desc: You need to be logged in to place an order. Please log in or create an account.
delivery_information_desc: We will deliver to the address saved in your profile.
chef_is_busy_desc: The chef is currently busy with other orders. You can still place your order, and it will be added to a queue.
track_your_current_orders: Track your current orders and their status.
no_ongoing_orders_customer: You have no ongoing orders at the moment.
view_past_orders: View your past orders and rate them.
no_orders_yet: You haven't placed any orders yet.
no_orders_yet_desc: Ready to taste something amazing? Browse our chefs and find your next favorite meal.
profile_desc: This is how others will see you on the site.
logout_desc: Are you sure you want to log out of your account?
customer_login_desc: Access your account to order delicious homemade food.
chef_login_desc: Access your dashboard to manage orders and your menu.
change_password_desc: For your security, please choose a strong new password.
customer_signup_desc: Sign up to start ordering from the best home chefs.
chef_signup_desc: Share your culinary passion and start earning.
rate_order_placeholder: How was the dish? Your feedback helps the chef and other customers!
delete_dish_warning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the dish '{{name}}' from your menu.
menu_management_desc: Add, edit, and manage the dishes you offer to customers.
your_menu_is_empty_desc: Start by adding your first dish to attract customers.
coupon_management_desc: Create and manage promotional coupons for your dishes.
no_coupons_desc: Create your first coupon to attract more customers.
specific_dishes_desc: Choose which of your dishes this coupon applies to.
no_dishes_to_add: You have no dishes to select.
bio_placeholder: Tell customers a little about yourself and your passion for cooking.
dish_description_placeholder: Describe your delicious dish to entice customers.
dish_ingredients_placeholder: e.g., beef, pasta, tomato sauce, mozzarella
try_different_search: Try a different search term or check back later.
wait_for_chefs: Please wait for chefs to join the platform.
forgot_password_desc_sent: If an account with that email exists, a password reset link has been sent.
forgot_password_desc_initial: No problem. Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link.
password_reset_link_sent: We've sent a password reset link to your email address.
demo_link_in_console: For this demo, the reset link is printed in the browser console.
password_reset_link_invalid: The password reset link is invalid or has expired.
validation_email_must_start_with_letter: Email must start with a letter.
unauthorized_email_desc: This email address is not permitted for this action.
reset_link_sent_desc: If an account exists for this email, a reset link has been sent.
passwords_do_not_match: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
password_changed_successfully_desc: You can now log in with your new password.
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
auth_password_requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long and include uppercase, lowercase, number, and symbol.
auth_email_not_allowed: This email address is not permitted for use on this platform.
auth_email_in_use: An account with this email already exists.
auth_incorrect_credentials: The email, password, or role is incorrect.
auth_must_be_logged_in_to_update: You must be logged in to update your profile.
auth_must_be_logged_in_to_change_passwor: You must be logged in to change your password.
auth_passwords_do_not_match: The new passwords do not match.
auth_old_password_incorrect: The old password you entered is incorrect.
auth_email_not_found: Email not found in our records.
new_chef_bio: Passionate chef specializing in {{specialty}}. Ready to bring delicious, authentic flavors to your table.
profile_updated_desc: Your changes have been saved successfully.
update_error_desc: There was an error updating your profile.
password_changed_toast_desc: Your password has been updated successfully.
password_change_failed_toast_desc: Please check your old password and try again.
dish_added_toast_desc: {{name}} has been added to your menu.
must_be_chef: You must be a chef to perform this action.
coupon_code_min_length: Code must be at least 3 characters.
discount_value_positive: Discount value must be a positive number.
usage_limit_min: Usage limit must be at least 1.
end_date_after_start_date: End date must be after the start date.
select_one_dish_for_specific: You must select at least one dish for specific coupons.
price_positive: Price must be a positive number.
dish_image_required: A dish image is required. Please upload one.
prep_time_positive: Prep time must be a positive integer.
order_error_desc: Please log in and ensure you have a delivery address set in your profile.
order_sent_toast_review_desc: Your order for {{quantity}}x {{dishName}} is now being reviewed by the chef.
order_sent_toast_waitlisted_desc: Your order has been placed in the chef's queue.
coupon_invalid_error: This coupon code is not valid.
coupon_limit_reached_error: This coupon has reached its usage limit.
coupon_not_applicable_error: This coupon is not applicable to the selected dish.
order_waitlisted_notification_desc: Your order for {{dishName}} is waitlisted. The chef is busy.
order_confirmed_notification_desc: Your order for {{dishName}} has been confirmed and is being prepared.
order_on_the_way_notification_desc: Your order for {{dishName}} is on its way to you.
order_delivered_notification_desc: Your order for {{dishName}} has been delivered. Enjoy your meal!
order_rejected_notification_desc: Unfortunately, your order for {{dishName}} has been rejected.
pending_orders_desc: Please review them in your dashboard.
